prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: Me. What more can I say? This is my third year as a young (but skilled!) lawyer.
Character 1
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.
Character 2
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.
Character 3
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.
Character 4
Name: Adrian Andrews
Description: Head of planning, promotion, and security of the Treasures of Kurain Exhibit.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Mask☆DeMasque
Description: A flashy thief who steals valuable works of art. Sends a calling card before a heist.
Character 7
Name: Luke Atmey
Description: An Ace Detective. Has great powers of deduction, yet rarely makes sense.
Character 8
Name: Ron DeLite
Description: A young man who turned himself in as Mask☆DeMasque. A bit of a pitiful guy.
Character 9
Name: Desirée DeLite
Description: Ron DeLite's wife. Seems to be a very friendly and out-going lady.
Character 10
Name: Larry Butz
Description: My friend. I've known this trouble magnet ever since grade school.
Character 11
Name: Godot
Description: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.
Character 12
Name: Kane Bullard
Description: CEO of KB Security. His body was found inside his safe.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.
Evidence 2
Name: Treasure Exhibit Poster
Description: A poster for the Treasures of Kurain exhibit. The Sacred Urn of Kurain Village will be displayed in Lordly Tailor.
Evidence 3
Name: Ami Fey's Golden Statue
Description: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Is holding the Shichishito. A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Moved the night of the crime. Carried into the basement warehouse the day of the crime. Moved again that night.
Evidence 4
Name: Sacred Urn
Description: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, it looks like a plain old pot. One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, but has no monetary value. Found in the office of Luke Atmey. Has pink splotches all over it. Found in Atmey's Office. Covered in pink splotches, but it's the genuine article. Broken and repaired by Adrian 2 weeks ago, then replaced in its box. Kept out of sight.
Evidence 5
Name: DeMasque's Calling Card
Description: Sent before a heist, the emblem is top-secret. Click here for details.
Evidence 6
Name: Shichishito
Description: A ceremonial sword held in the hand of Ami Fey's statue. Wasn't bent before the crime. DeMasque knocked Atmey out during the crime w/ a blow to the back of the head.
Evidence 7
Name: Camera Data
Description: The warehouse camera went off at around 1 AM on the night of the crime.
Evidence 8
Name: Desirée's Letter
Description: Addressed to her husband Ron DeLite. Apparently contains something important.
Evidence 9
Name: Security Camera Photo
Description: Photo of storeroom entrance taken by the camera. Click here for details.
Evidence 10
Name: Blackmail Letter
Description: Written with a fountain pen. Found in Ron's room. Click here to read. Found in Ron DeLite's room. Written by Bullard. Click here to read.
Evidence 11
Name: Ron's Wallet
Description: Found by Larry at his part-time security job's company building (night of the crime).
Evidence 12
Name: Key Card
Description: Found inside Ron's wallet. Apparently used for the building of his part-time job. Found in Ron's wallet. Opens the KB Security CEO's office. Leaves a record when used. Found in Ron's wallet. Used on October 12th, the night of the crime, at 1 AM.
Evidence 13
Name: Publicity Photo
Description: A shot of Mask☆DeMasque striking a pose. Click here for details.
Evidence 14
Name: DeMasque's Broach
Description: Found in the shadow of Ami Fey's statue. Looks like it was torn off of some clothing.
Evidence 15
Name: Kane's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 10/12 at 1 AM. Cause: Cerebral hemorrhaging from blunt trauma to the head.
Evidence 16
Name: Newspaper Clipping
Description: An article on Mask☆DeMasque's first heist. Click here for details. About first heist. Guard in photo is Ron DeLite. Click here for details.
Evidence 17
Name: CEO Office Buzzer
Description: Connected to the basement Security Guard Office. There are no fingerprints on it.
Evidence 18
Name: Kane's List
Description: Found on a table at the crime scene. Click here for details.
Evidence 19
Name: Buzzer Record
Description: The buzzer went off once at 1:02 AM on October 12 in the CEO's office.
Evidence 20
Name: Ron's Testimony
Description: From DeMasque's 2nd heist on, he was stealing as directed by blackmail letters.
Evidence 21
Name: Urn Box
Description: A wooden box that had the Sacred Urn in it. Has pink paint stains on it.
Evidence 22
Name: Paint Marks
Description: Completely dry. The box of the Sacred Urn fits in the gap perfectly. When Adrian dropped the urn's box 2 weeks ago she also knocked over some paint.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: The truth is, I've been Mask☆DeMasque all along!
Person: Ron
Testimony 1
Testimony: I mean, you can't prove that I'm not actually Mask☆DeMasque, can you?
Person: Ron
Testimony 2
Testimony: I don't have an alibi for the night the urn was stolen, after all!
Person: Ron
Testimony 3
Testimony: I donned my costume that night and dancingly descended upon the scene of the crime!
Person: Ron
Testimony 4
Testimony: Look! You can see right there in the photo! That's me!
Person: Ron
Testimony 5
Testimony: As for my broach, I snagged it on the door handle and it got torn off, that's all!
Person: Ron

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
response:
Okay, let's tackle this problem. So, I need to find which evidence and testimony contradict each other. The characters, evidences, and testimonies are given. The user wants just one pair, in JSON format at the end. Let's start by going through the testimonies and seeing which ones might clash with the evidence.

First, the testimonies are all from Ron (Testimonies 0-5). Let me list out his statements:

Testimony 0: He claims he's Mask☆DeMasque.
Testimony 1: Challenges to prove he's not.
Testimony 2: No alibi the night the urn was stolen.
Testimony 3: Says he put on the costume and went to the crime scene that night.
Testimony 4: Points to a photo showing him.
Testimony 5: Explains the broach was torn off on a door handle.

Now, looking at the evidence. Let's check each one related to Ron's claims.

Evidence 12: Key Card found in Ron's wallet. It was used on October 12th at 1 AM at the KB Security CEO's office. The CEO (Kane Bullard) died at 1 AM according to Autopsy Report (Evidence 15). Also, the Buzzer Record (Evidence 19) shows the buzzer went off at 1:02 AM. The Key Card's use at 1 AM would mean Ron was at the CEO's office during the time of the murder. 

But Ron's Testimony 3 says he was at the crime scene (the exhibit?) that night, dressed as Mask☆DeMasque. However, if he used the Key Card at 1 AM at the CEO's office, he couldn't be in two places at once. Wait, but the crime here might be the murder of Kane Bullard, whose body was found in his safe (Character 12's description). The Sacred Urn was stolen, which was found in Atmey's office. So, there might be two crimes: the theft of the urn and the murder of Kane Bullard.

Wait, the Key Card (Evidence 12) is linked to the KB Security building. So, Ron's Key Card was used at the CEO's office (Kane's office) at 1 AM, the time of death. So if Ron used the key card then, he was at the scene of the murder. But his testimony 3 says he was at the scene of the theft (the exhibit where the urn was stolen). But perhaps the two are separate locations. Let me check the evidence again.

Treasure Exhibit Poster (Evidence 2) mentions the Sacred Urn was displayed at Lordly Tailor. The Sacred Urn (Evidence 4) was found in Atmey's office. The KB Security CEO's office is where the murder happened. So if Ron's Key Card was used at 1 AM at the CEO's office, that's the murder location, while the theft of the urn was at Lordly Tailor. So Ron's Testimony 3 says he was at the theft scene (exhibit) that night, but the Key Card places him at the murder scene (CEO's office) at 1 AM. That's a contradiction because he can't be in both places at the same time.

So Testimony 3 (Ron claiming he was at the crime scene, i.e., the exhibit) contradicts Evidence 12 (Key Card used at CEO's office at 1 AM). But wait, the murder and the theft might be at different times. Let's check the time of death: Evidence 15 (Autopsy Report) says time of death is 1 AM. The Key Card was used at 1 AM. So Ron was at the CEO's office at the exact time of the murder. But Testimony 3 says he was at the exhibit (theft scene) that night. Unless the theft and murder happened at the same time but different places, which would mean Ron couldn't be both places. That's a contradiction.

Alternatively, Testimony 4: Ron says the photo shows him. Looking at Evidence 13 (Publicity Photo of Mask☆DeMasque), if the photo is from a different time, but the evidence might show something else. Wait, Evidence 9 is the Security Camera Photo. Let me check. Evidence 9 is a photo of the storeroom entrance taken by the camera. The Camera Data (Evidence 7) says the warehouse camera went off at 1 AM. If the Security Camera Photo (Evidence 9) shows someone (maybe Mask☆DeMasque) at the storeroom at 1 AM, but Ron's Key Card was used at 1 AM at the CEO's office, that's a contradiction. So if the Security Photo shows him there, but the Key Card shows he was elsewhere, that's a conflict. But I need to check which testimony and evidence clash.

Testimony 4: Ron says "Look! You can see right there in the photo! That's me!" Assuming he's referring to the Security Camera Photo (Evidence 9) taken at 1 AM. But Evidence 12's Key Card shows he was at the CEO's office at 1 AM. So he can't be in both places. Therefore, Evidence 12 (Key Card) contradicts Testimony 4 where he claims the photo shows him (implying he was at the storeroom entrance when the camera took the photo at 1 AM). 

But wait, the Camera Data (Evidence 7) says the warehouse camera went off at 1 AM, and the Security Camera Photo (Evidence 9) is of the storeroom entrance. If the Key Card was used at 1 AM at the CEO's office, then Ron can't be in the storeroom entrance at the same time. Therefore, Testimony 4 (Ron says the photo shows him) is contradicted by Evidence 12 (Key Card used at 1 AM elsewhere). That would be the pair.

Alternatively, Testimony 3 where Ron says he was at the crime scene (the exhibit) that night. If the Key Card shows he was at the CEO's office at 1 AM, and the exhibit theft happened around the same time, that's a contradiction. But I need to check the timing of the theft. The Sacred Urn was stolen when? The Camera Data (Evidence 7) is warehouse camera at 1 AM. The statue (Evidence 3) was moved the night of the crime. The Buzzer Record (Evidence 19) is at 1:02 AM. So the timing is tight. 

If Ron's Testimony 3 says he was at the exhibit (theft scene) that night, but the Key Card places him at the CEO's office (murder scene) at 1 AM, then he couldn't be in both places. So the contradiction would be between Testimony 3 and Evidence 12. But which is the right pair?

Alternatively, Testimony 4: "Look! You can see right there in the photo! That's me!" If the Security Camera Photo (Evidence 9) was taken at 1 AM, and the Key Card (Evidence 12) shows he was elsewhere, then that's a contradiction. But is the Security Camera Photo (Evidence 9) taken at 1 AM? Let me check Evidence 7: Camera Data says the warehouse camera went off at around 1 AM. So the Security Camera Photo (Evidence 9) is from that time. Therefore, if Ron's Testimony 4 says he's in the photo (taken at 1 AM), but Evidence 12 shows his Key Card was used at the same time in another location, that's a contradiction. So Evidence 12 and Testimony 4 contradict each other.

But the answer needs to be one pair. So, the correct answer would be {"evidence": 12, "testimony": 4} because Ron claims to be in the photo (Testimony 4) which was taken at 1 AM, but his Key Card (Evidence 12) shows he was at the CEO's office at that exact time, making it impossible.

{"evidence": 12, "testimony": 4}
